tool.name: datasets.paul15

configfiles.configfile:
import scanpy.api as sc
sc.datasets.paul15()
adata.write_loom($csv_output) adata.write_csv($loom_output)

tool.help:
Development of Myeloid Progenitors [Paul15]_.
Non-logarithmized raw data.
The data has been sent out by Email from the Amit Lab. An R version for loading the data can be found here https://github.com/theislab/scAnalysisTutorial
Returns ------- adata : :class:`~anndata.AnnData` Annotated data matrix.
